name: Enter The Castle (WIP)
description:
Hi !

Here is an (very) early prototype of my immersive game I'm trying to make as a solo project !

My goal is to make a game kind of like Dishonored. The level to build will allows you to complete a mission with different ways.

For now you can play the Test Map with the first features :

  • Move and use a blink with right mouse button
  • Interact with lootable object and the NPC.

Soon to be done :

  • Adding an axe to our hero, which give him a melee attack and a range attack (just like God Of War :) )
  • Adding enemies with range attack

Commands :

  • Walking  : Z, S, Q, and D
  • Blink : Right Mouse button
  • Interact : E
